name: Adaro
passiveAbility: When Adaro summons an aquatic Knowledge, draw a card from the Market (no Action cost).

name: Caapora
passiveAbility: At the start of your turn, if the Opponent has more cards in hand than you, deal 1 damage to the Opponent.

name: Dudugera
passiveAbility: Dudugera can summon Knowledges without spending Actions.

name: Inkanyamba
passiveAbility: When you draw an aquatic Knowledge, you may discard 1 card from the Market.

name: Japinunus
passiveAbility: Your aeric Knowledges gain: 'On Summon: +1 Power'.

name: Kappa
passiveAbility: Kappa can summon aquatic Knowledges without spending Actions.

name: Kyzy
passiveAbility: When any player summons a terrestrial Knowledge, the Opponent must discard 1 card.

name: Lisovik
passiveAbility: Your terrestrial Knowledges gain: 'On Leave: Deal 1 damage'.

name: Pele
passiveAbility: When Pele summons a terrestrial Knowledge, discard an Opponent's Knowledge with a lower Wisdom cost.

name: Tarasca
passiveAbility: When the Opponent summons a terrestrial Knowledge, deal 1 damage to the Opponent.

name: Tsenehale
passiveAbility: Your aeric Knowledges gain: 'On Leave: +1 Power'.

name: Tulpar
passiveAbility: When Tulpar summons an aeric Knowledge, rotate this creature 1 time (no Action cost).

name: Zhar Ptitsa
passiveAbility: Your aeric Knowledges cannot be blocked.
